name: He Keeps Shooting ME!
description:
Hello, this is my game for the trijam game jam

i know it suck, but at least i tried!

i hope you guys like it, im not an expert at making games.

also theres an website for it lol

controls

space to run (it will follow your mouse)

click on the green thing i forgot the name lol to shoot him

Stop scrolling down dude! ok?? i will give you an secret! press q to heal yourself forever!

also help me i sacrified my brain
